top10_tweets_like: For those that are new to the DataCamp controversy:  I have been following it from the beginning, and I'm here to share a bit so you know why this is big news and why the #rstats community is so fired up:

In addition to '+' I'm contemplating a new '|' operator for #rstats #rspatial üì¶ {mapview} to allow for a slider between two maps as in the example below (taken from ?leaflet.extras2::addSideBySide):

mapview(franconia) | mapview(breweries)

Would this be of interest/useful? https://t.co/10ozt7eLwv

I've compiled some of my favorite resources for learning #rstats (for free!) and highlighted reasons why each may be a good fit for your needs!

https://t.co/8lX3NMP90D

(üôèthank you for inspiration @jessicalavs,  @djnavarro, @kbodwin, @Jonthegeek, @tylermorganwall, & @rctatman)

Can we please stop doing this! üíî
Imagine coming from a non-CS background, worked hard learning #rstats the whole semester, today you actually feel pretty good because you managed to put together a legit ‚ú®dashboard‚ú®, and then you find this on LinkedIn. üòû https://t.co/8wqshvLSdL
